name: Diddle - Note Name Game for Piano
name_original: Diddle - Note Name Game for Piano
description:
Connect any MIDI keyboard in order to play. (On-screen keyboard coming soon)

Survive for as long as you can before the notes push you off the cliff. 

Become a master at finding any note on the piano at lightning speed. 

If you have any trouble connecting, or any ideas on how to make the game better, please leave a comment! I appreciate any feedback :)
